website_summaries.verdict: Well made and reasonably priced, these nifty snack bags have earned a loyal fan base. An affordable set of 2 quality reusable snack bags.
pros: Single ply construction keeps moisture and crumbs from getting trapped between layers
free of BPA, PVC, vinyl, phthalates, and lead
cons: Keeps crunchy snacks fresh for hours, but doesn't fare quite as well from morning to night

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a weird reason, but they work perfectly. I use one to put poo bags in while I'm walking the dog (so I don't have to walk 2-3 miles holding green poo bags the whole time). I used the tag to clip a very small carabiner to my pup's leash I use the second one for a pencil case. I have washed them, and they wash up really well!
customer_reviews.author: shortcake

customer_reviews.title: Useful for organizing items in my purse
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to carry my lipsticks and glosses in my purse because the lids kept coming off in my bag. These are super cute, and much less embarrassing to pull out of my purse than the raggedy ziplock I used for years. I have three taller glosses and two regular lipsticks in the bag, 5 altogether. I could probably fit 2 more inside. I also use one of these to hold hard bubble-foil-wrapped gum pieces, because the sharp edges have more than once jammed under a fingernail when reaching into my purse. The little bag stands up to the sharp corners with no issue. Pen added for visual size reference.
customer_reviews.author: cc: reading-tho!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my toddler/pre-k children
customer_reviews.text: The size on these is just like a plastic snack size bag except my kids can open and close them much more easily than a plastic one. They're able to fill their own fish/carrots/etc. into the bag and access it in the car without my help! So excited about that!!! We wash them inside out by hand and haven't had any problems with food stuck in the seam or anything. After a few months of use they're still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: HDTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: So far, I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Just received these in the mail today. I'm super excited to get them washed and try them out for food transport for my almost 12month old. Based on pictures and reviews, size was as expected. Quality seems durable. The print matches my wet bags I use for cloth diapers (if you're familiar with bumkins wet bags, the lining is not as thick and therefore doesn't seem quite as water resistant). I will update review after several uses. Photos of product, packaging, and instructions on English included.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for snacks
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I use them to carry snacks while at work. I mainly use them for dry snacks like almonds and dried fruit, but I can also use them for hard boiled eggs. Just pop them in the fridge! They aren’t 100% leakproof as there are little holes in the corners between the fabric and the zipper, but I haven’t lost an almond or an egg yet. The bags can be turned inside out for easy cleaning. They’re also very durable and so far have not faded in color. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Canelos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for returning to school during pandemic
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's school wanted to have the kids bring their snacks and lunch in reusable bags. I found these and decided to give them a shot. Well, these bags are great! They work very well for what we needed. The transfer is cool, and she loves the patterns.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Multifunctional and VERY Useful
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use these for (dry) snacks but I did use them for crayons when traveling once and the inside has cleaned up nice after both! I just got so sick of wasting small plastic bags and decided to invest a little money in something I use 6+ days a week. They are the size of name brand "snack size" baggies and have held up to months of almost daily use and as-needed washes with no signs of wear. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Not good for storing items in purse.
customer_reviews.text: Seems small and flimsy, but honestly, I bought it to keep grooming tools in and it’s too small and flimsy for that. Would have preferred something with more structure; this just folds in on itself easily.
customer_reviews.author: diane wanicur

customer_reviews.title: Great for younger kids lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these in daughter's lunchbox for a week now, so far so good! Did fine in the dishwasher, even on sanitize setting. Best for little kids, doesn't hold much, but enough crackers or veggies for a 6 yr old. Could possibly fit 1/2 a sandwich.
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Stop plastic waste
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for Granola or loose leaf teas as the zipper holds everything inside. Washable which is great, and drys overnight so you can use again the next day. not water proof, yet not leaky more like a windbreaker material that block most yet if submerged it would become wet. Highly recommend to stop the plastic baggie waste!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Replacing disposables
customer_reviews.text: Great little bags! I love them! They area great alternative to ziploc bags. I hand wash them in the sink with some soap and place them to dry, and they are ready for the morning. They hold fruits and vegetables well, no staleness or anything. Pretzels or crackers I have always put in the bag the morning of and have had no problems doing it that way. Other reviews had an issue with that when doing it the night before, so I've avoided it. For the price and quality, they are worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Anon Mom  ïß

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these snack bags! They are simple to use and hold the perfect amount for lunches or snacks. We have used for everything from grapes to crackers without problems. Cleaning is easy, I just turn them inside out and wash with soap and water and then hang it dry. They dry quickly as well.
customer_reviews.author: A2MomTo3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for replacing plastic snack baggies.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a bunch of these in every color for the 18/19 school year. They are awesome! They're snack bags, so they're not leak proof. For cleaning, I flip them inside out and throw them in the dishwasher. My 3 kids are hard on their stuff, but these held up the entire school year and are now with the lunchboxes, ready for next year. I'll be ordering some in the sandwich size for 19/20...
customer_reviews.author: N. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly sized and useful.
customer_reviews.text: Love this size! I love these bags in general for packing snacks and lunches. This size is especially useful for my toddler. I can put in a perfect amount for him and it's not so big a bag that he struggles and spills the snack out. I sometimes even use these at home to give him a snack.
customer_reviews.author: Kate in Maine

customer_reviews.title: cute bot not practical
customer_reviews.text: The design is super cute however these are not really that practical. I tried putting snacks in them for my son however these are not air tight and the food gets stale right away (crackers or goldfish etc). The good old zip lock bags do a much better job than this.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Gemma

customer_reviews.title: good for dry snacks, questionable with moisture
customer_reviews.text: I love these for dry snacks, I washed some grapes and put them in the bag, before I knew it the whole lunch box was wet - not sure if it leaked out where the zipper closes or if it soaked through the bag. We use them frequently for on the go, my toddler loves pulling his snacks out if this bag more so than any of the toddler snack cups.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri T

customer_reviews.title: For dry food
customer_reviews.text: I love to use these for dry food like crackers. They are a good size and very durable. The patterns are cute and children seem to love them.
customer_reviews.author: Kay M

customer_reviews.title: Use for high school snacks
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses these for cereal and crackers as high school snacks. Would like more grown up designs as they are not just for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: GSauer

customer_reviews.title: Reusable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. I use this daily to store snacks in the diaper bag. I love that it doesn’t leak, super easy to clean too! I toss them in the washer and dryer with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Lee Long

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to ziplock bags
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for about a year. They are easy to clean by hand. I have had some of the “flavor blasted” goldfish stain them orange a little. Like normal plastic bags, crackers eventually get stale (after ~8 hours). They are easy to clean by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good products
customer_reviews.text: I love this products! I never used reusable snack bags, but this one make me want to buy some more. This product has no smells, food smell doesn’t stay in this bag, and it has cute designs! I bought some other brand reusable bags because they are cheaper than Bumkins. But other brands bags had plastic smells... yuck. So I ordered Bumkins snack again. It’s seems to pricy but it worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: Chihiro

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! My kids use them daily for their school snacks and they're always excited to being them home so they can keep using them! I heatpressed their names into the bags, works great!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany H.

customer_reviews.title: love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Super cute patterns. They are not waterproof though, so dry snacks only. Can throw in the washing machine too. The kids love eating out of them and I do too. Good quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Koehler Family

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not Great
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and effective! However, I wish there was an extra lining inside like I've had in some of my other reusable snack bags. I feel like these get messier easier? They're alright, but I would probably buy a different brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great option for kids snacks on the go or anything really. Lota of fun designs and keeps food fresh all day
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled.
customer_reviews.text: The prints are adorable but they aren’t the best quality. They stain easily and are very thin material.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for dry snacks in my lunch! A great size for portion control. Best if used for crackers, nuts, trail mix granola, great idea!
customer_reviews.author: KShinn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and durable
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are great for keeping in a diaper bag and can be easily cleaned in the washing machine or with a wipe. the print is cute and does not fade.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: So versatile and a great addition to my diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I love bumkins products! I actually purchased these not to use a snack bags but for my sons toothbrush and toothpaste travel bag and also for when I need to keep medicine in my diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: portion control in a clean, reusable on-the-go pocket
customer_reviews.text: Since I got 4 of these, I've pretty much eliminate the snack size (disposable) plastic bags. Mission accomplished!
customer_reviews.author: apprieto

customer_reviews.title: but so far I like them. Zipper & material are good quality
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t washed them yet, but so far I like them. Zipper & material are good quality. I might get a bigger one, as well. I have tried a few different ones, so far this is the best one. I put veggies in them, works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels_OfTheHeart

customer_reviews.title: Freshness
customer_reviews.text: Does not keep snacks fresh in bag for more than 2 days snacks becomes s+ale must eat quickly
customer_reviews.author: B Me

customer_reviews.title: LOVE using these instead of plastic bags
customer_reviews.text: LOVE using these instead of plastic bags. Not only are they super handy for snacks, but they make you feel great about all the plastic trees you're saving.
customer_reviews.author: roxie

customer_reviews.title: okay product, not really great for snacks
customer_reviews.text: since the seal is just a regular zipper, it does not really seal your food how a ziploc bag would. snacks tend to get stale pretty quickly. good for short term use. would probably be better off buying a reusable "ziploc" like bag instead. also the minimum quantity is two, forcing you to buy a total of four bags, which is kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: XB

customer_reviews.title: Great to save money (oh, and the environment
customer_reviews.text: Reduce your plastic waste with these! I don’t even buy ziplock bags anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Martyn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are great for taking snacks on the go and throwing in school lunches. I've washed them in the dishwasher and my washing machine. Either works fine. Very durable. They're not waterproof, so great for dry treats like crackers or dried fruit. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for fruit, bad for crispies
customer_reviews.text: I only use these for fruit, vegetables, and non-crispy snacks. The portion size is perfect but the bag is not air/humidity proof so your crispies will get soft in here.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: Great for snack bags! Thin, so I wouldn't put wet foods in there but I do put cut zucchini and things like that in. Easy to wash, I just flip inside out to wash and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Marie E. Beck

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love these snack bags for other little trinkets. They are so cute and make it easy to find small items when I throw them in a larger bag.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy for me to use this at work even though people think it’s gross. It feels a little like parachute fabric but it keeps my snacks like a plastic bag. It’s great and I can wash it whenever I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind C. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great way to reduce waste - and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love using these for snacks for school lunches or on the go. Never had a leak, wash them in the washing machine on cold, and they're cute! Feels good to not be using disposable bags and tossing them every day.
customer_reviews.author: rani

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t exactly what I was expecting for the price I paid.. They will work fine but I don’t understand the price point. Whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline’s Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Excellent snack bags
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent snack baggies to use throughout the day. I use them for raisins, grapes, carrots, hard boiled eggs, etc.. Durable and easy to wash. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Silverman

customer_reviews.title: I Love these bags
customer_reviews.text: I Love these bags! I have at least a dozen of them and I've been using some for over 5 years and despite being washed over and over, they still work!
customer_reviews.author: sdgardner

customer_reviews.title: Cute and handy
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and handy! I actually use them to carry my feminine products in my purse. Discreet and much cuter than the plastic Baggie I was using! They are well made and washable so I expect to be able to use these a long time.
customer_reviews.author: shcanada

customer_reviews.title: These are great for a little take along snack
customer_reviews.text: These are great for a little take along snack. They're not a cloth fabric, so they don't stain badly, but I still throw them in the washer just fine. Perfect for little hands.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J Wygant

customer_reviews.title: I no longer use zip locks
customer_reviews.text: This is really a game changer and I should have bought these sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: Good for snacks
customer_reviews.text: Great for dry snacks (chips, crackers, cookies, etc)! Does speed up drying as compared to a ziplock, but veggies seem to keep their moisture by lunch/snack time.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: I love using these bags instead of plastic ones
customer_reviews.text: I love using these bags instead of plastic ones! They are so cute! They are also easy to clean. I just throw them in the washer and they come out good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Lari Goodson

customer_reviews.title: These are great and are helping us reduce the amount of plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great and are helping us reduce the amount of plastic snack bags we were using. I didn't realize that these would not keep crackers, etc. fresh (they are not air tight) so that is the one down side.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra E.

customer_reviews.title: I love the fabric
customer_reviews.text: Trying to be one a plastic-free household, and these were among my first purchases toward that end. I love the fabric, and they’re easy to clean. Dry fast.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Herold

customer_reviews.title: Love these snack bags
customer_reviews.text: Love these snack bags! super durable, easy to wash and cute. Worth it to know I am not putting more plastic in the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Have had other ones, but they always disappear. These are perfect for smaller snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Berry

customer_reviews.title: Great snack bags for all ages
customer_reviews.text: These are great. My kids (2 and 5) love having their own snack bags and opening them themselves. Easy to clean too. Wish I got them earlier.
customer_reviews.author: lenasu11

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We love these snack bags. Super easy to use and clean - would definitely buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Mosby

customer_reviews.title: Great size for snacks on the go
customer_reviews.text: Great size for snacks on the go. Easy to wash and dry quickly. Also use one in baby bag to contain a little on the go first aid kit.
customer_reviews.author: SSZLC

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase! No need to waste ziplock bags with ...
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase! No need to waste ziplock bags with these reusable ones!
customer_reviews.author: hbn45

customer_reviews.title: We love these!! Replacing all the ziploc bags!
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I love these we have quite a collection!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Healy

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I use these everyday for lunch snacks. They are fantastic. Pop right into the dishwasher or laundry. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sheer

customer_reviews.title: Great snack bag
customer_reviews.text: It's small, perfect for my toddler snacks. Great for fresh fruit, small veggies like baby carrots, or. Crackers. Easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these, easy to clean. Great product. Will order again!
customer_reviews.author: BugsMamae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Sturdy and Washable
customer_reviews.text: These are great for snacks, and also for training treats for dogs.
customer_reviews.author: V. DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love these snack bags perfect for my 6 year snacks easy for her to close back up with the zipper
customer_reviews.author: espie macias

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags. Highly recommend people start using more of these instead of the disposable ones.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnea Waheed

customer_reviews.title: Great little bags
customer_reviews.text: Like these little bags to use for my lunch, store kids crayons in, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Co-Nicole-222

customer_reviews.title: These bags are great! I send snacks to school with my kids ...
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great! I send snacks to school with my kids in them. I feel much better using a reusable bag each day.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra J. Frigard

customer_reviews.title: Great for snacks AND traveling items.
customer_reviews.text: Great for snacks and even to hold makeup! If it spilled in the bag..a cinch to clean!

customer_reviews.title: Green, clean and reduces waste.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for so many things! Good bye plastic, disposables!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these things. They're perfect for snacks and the designs aren't gaudy. LOVE.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: I have even run them through the dishwasher and they held up just fine.
customer_reviews.text: They work really well. I have even run them through the dishwasher and they held up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Pattern is so cute and nice quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Bumkins Snack Bags, Reusable, Washable, Food Safe, BPA Free, 2-Pack – Bird Park & Urban Bird
product_meta.description: The better alternative to single-use plastic bags, our reusable snack bags are made from the same easy-wipe waterproof and stain-resistant fabric as Bumkins award-winning SuperBib. A smooth zipper closure doesn't hold crumbs and single-ply construction means no worrying about icky stuff growing between layers of fabric. Great for food and fun, snack bags help organize snacks, lunches, toys, electronics and more. Also available in a larger sandwich size. Machine washable and dishwasher-safe (top rack) for easy cleaning. Food safe, BPA-free, PVC-free, vinyl-free, phthalate-free and lead-free. Measures 3.5”x7”. Designed in Arizona, responsibly made in China.
feature_bullets: REUSE AND REDUCE WASTE – The better alternative to single-use plastic bags. Bumkins Sandwich Bags and Snack Bags single ply construction means no worrying about icky stuff growing between layers of fabric. Without a cotton layer, stains and smells don't stick to your bag. Easy to wash - use over and over again! Never run out of plastic bags!

LAB TESTED FOOD SAFE – At Bumkins, we take pride in our rigorous product testing to ensure you have the safest possible products. Our sandwich and snack bags are BPA-free, PVC-free, vinyl-free, phthalate-free and lead-free.

LONG-LASTING – Made from Bumkins' signature waterproof and stain-resistant fabric that’s both soft and strong. Tough enough for daily use, it stands up to messes. (although fabric is waterproof, bags are not completely leakproof due to zippered closure)

EASY-TO-CLEAN – Our fabric is wipeable, machine washable and dishwasher-safe (top rack). Turn inside-out to wash. To extend the life of our reusable bags, we recommend air drying our quick-dry fabric.

LOTS OF USES – Not just for food. Sandwich and snack bags make excellent organizers for storage and travel! Stash inside your purse, diaper bag, or travel bag. Great for pacifiers, cosmetics, cash, electronics, and more.
